author: dkhaywood
msg: Removed most of the Check hierarchy, with view to replacing with Facets.   Renamed ValidatingFacet -> ValidatingInteractionAdvisor, similarly for the HidingFacet and DisablingFacet.

author: dkhaywood
msg: Removed FieldRegEx, and RegExProcessor, moved functionality into RegExFacetAnnotation; removed setRegEx from StringAdapter, and so instead isEntryValid delegates to the NakedObjectSpecification (ie any regex intrinsic to the (value) type, rather than copied over and specific to the (value) property).
